comments:
Platform Validation Test failed on Apollo because of no org.junit_3.8.2.jar.

I tested Platform Validation Test in latest DeviceKit weekly build ( 20070910 ) on Apollo, and found the org.eclipse.soda.dk.platform.validation.test.agent can not be started because it need junit 3.8.2 bundle. Since the Platform Validation Test is for open source to validate general OSGi platforms, it should include the proper junit bundle in the build.

org.osgi.framework.BundleException: The bundle could not be resolved. Reason: Missing Constraint: Import-Package: junit.framework; version="3.8.2"
        at org.eclipse.osgi.framework.internal.core.BundleHost.startWorker(BundleHost.java:302)
        at org.eclipse.osgi.framework.internal.core.AbstractBundle.start(AbstractBundle.java:260)
        at org.eclipse.osgi.framework.internal.core.AbstractBundle.start(AbstractBundle.java:252)
        at org.eclipse.osgi.framework.internal.core.FrameworkCommandProvider._start(FrameworkCommandProvider.java:239)
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:85)
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:58)
        at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:60)
        at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:391)
        at org.eclipse.osgi.framework.internal.core.FrameworkCommandInterpreter.execute(FrameworkCommandInterpreter.java:145)
        at org.eclipse.osgi.framework.internal.core.FrameworkConsole.docommand(FrameworkConsole.java:290)
        at org.eclipse.osgi.framework.internal.core.FrameworkConsole.console(FrameworkConsole.java:275)
        at org.eclipse.osgi.framework.internal.core.FrameworkConsole.run(FrameworkConsole.java:210)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:568)

traces.message: The bundle could not be resolved. Reason: Missing Constraint: Import-Package: junit.framework; version="3.8.2"
